meanings.definition: A shot fired into the air.
meanings.sent1: During the celebration, a loud airshot echoed through the sky.
meanings.sent2: The airshot at the party signaled the start of the festivities.
meanings.sent3: The airshot startled the birds, making them fly away in a hurry.
meanings.sent4: The airshot pierced the silence of the night like a sudden lightning bolt.
meanings.sent5: The airshot was so loud that it seemed to shake the very clouds above.

meanings.definition: Within range of a shot fired into the air.
meanings.sent1: The target was well within airshot distance from the shooter.
meanings.sent2: The campsite was located in an airshot area, so they could hear distant sounds clearly.
meanings.sent3: The airshot range was so vast that even whispers could be heard from afar.
meanings.sent4: She felt safe knowing she was always within airshot of help if needed.
meanings.sent5: The village was nestled in a valley, well within airshot of the neighboring town.
